info.title: Operate an expanded disclosure button in reading mode

setupScript.name: moveFocusToAndExpandFirstDisclosure
setupScript.description: sets focus on the first disclosure button, and sets its state to expanded

user: With the reading cursor on the first disclosure button in the list of frequently asked questions, set the state of the button to collapsed.
instructions.raw: With the reading cursor on the first disclosure button in the list of frequently asked questions, set the state of the button to collapsed.
instructions.mode: Verify the Virtual Cursor is active by pressing Alt+Delete. If it is not, turn on the Virtual Cursor by pressing Insert+Z.

assertions.expectation: Change in state (to collapsed) is conveyed
